title: karuNai pozhiyum tirumurugan
sahitya:
karuNai pozhiyum tirumurugan avanai karuttuDan kai tozhu iru mAdaruDan vandiDum


anupallavi

  aruNagiri pADum azhagu mayilErum perumanai kumaranai guruparanai ninai


caraNam    paramporuLai uNartta parashivan sevi kaNDAn tiramAna vEl onru tAyiDam tAn koNDAn
varam tarum mun nAngu karangaLuDan n inrAn piravAmaip-pera tan padamE gati enrAn
